name: vivo iQOO 15
highlights:
Not announced yet

Android 16, up to 4 major upgrades
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, glass back or glass fiber back
BODY:
IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
RGB LED light on the back
Color-changing rear panel

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, 2592Hz PWM, HDR10+, 2600 nits (HBM)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 4 major Android upgrades, OriginOS 6 (China)
PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS
50 MP, (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 15mm (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, AF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
